title: Introducing: Odisha
body:
I’m fairly sure that **Drake’s** Hold On We’re Going Home is the most covered song of the year, with Arctic Monkeys, Holy Ghost and ASTR famously trying their hand at it recently, alongside a host of other artists.

Toronto’s _Odisha_ has also given it a go, with his version not altering the original too much, yet deviating enough to put his own mark on it. Alongside the Drake cover, Odisha’s debut single proper _Roads_ is a slice of **The Weeknd** inspired R&B, addictive and intelligent. Check out Roads below, as well as his cover.

Toronto’s Odisha has also given it a go, with his version not altering the original too much, \[…\]
